item.title: Bitcoin briefly breaks below $73,000 to lowest since November 2024 as heavy selling resumes
item.description: Bitcoin fell below $73,000 on Tuesday as investors sold the asset to hedge against heightened geopolitical and economic uncertainties.

item.title: Stocks making the biggest moves premarket: AMD, Uber, Eli Lilly, Super Micro, Chipotle, Enphase and more
item.description: These are the stocks posting the largest moves in premarket trading.

item.title: China set to attend India's upcoming AI summit signaling improving relations with New Delhi
item.description: A Chinese science and technology vice minister will attend India's AI summit this month, a consultant told CNBC, citing government contacts.
